requirements.summary: Remove the unwanted border on the top of the chat input area in the MessageInput component
acceptanceCriteria: The top border of the chat input area is no longer visible
Other borders and styling remain intact

file_operations.description: Remove the border-t or border-top styling from the chat input area container. Locate the main container div of the MessageInput component and remove any border-t, border-t-* Tailwind classes or inline styles that create the top border. Ensure other borders (left, right, bottom) remain unchanged if they exist.

requirements.summary: Restore the character counter that was accidentally removed from the MessageInput component
acceptanceCriteria: Character counter is visible in the chat input area
Counter accurately displays remaining characters as user types
Counter styling matches the overall design

file_operations.description: Add back the character counter UI element to the MessageInput component. Calculate remaining characters based on the current text input value and a character limit (determine the limit from existing validation logic). Display the counter near the text input area (typically bottom-right or next to the send button) with styling that matches the app's design system. Show the counter in a muted color when under limit and warning color when approaching or exceeding the limit. Ensure the counter updates in real-time as the user types.
